page.title: 02PERTON
page.content: Perton, Staffordshire is an area situated about six to eight miles from the town of Wolverhampton. To the west of Perton Village is the old settlement of Perton-once it was the only settlement in the area-today it is a lane of expensive homes. Nearby is the hamlet of Trescott this consists of a few houses and farm buildings along the main road to Bridgnorth. To the east is Castlecroft, which is part of Wolverhampton town. Here you would be able to walk along a disused railway track or walk along the banks of the Staffordshire and Worcestershire Canal. North of Castlecroft is Wightwick Manor, here you can find Smestow Brook.
